mapper.select: select t.tname,t.id,t.tinterest,t.loantime,t.dayormonth,t.tamount, t.finishtamount,t.tbegintime,t.tstatus from TENDERITEM t where t.ONANDDOWN =1 and t.Displaytype=1
select t.tname,t.id,t.tinterest,t.loantime,t.dayormonth,t.tamount, t.finishtamount from tenderitem t where t.tstatus=3 and t.displaytype=1

select t.id,t.tno,t.tname,t.tamount,t.finishtamount,t.lastretdate,t.retDate,t.loantime,t.dayormonth,t.tinterest*100 as tinterest,t.repaymentPro,t.minOnceTAmount,t.tendtime,t.tbegintime,t.valuerule ,t.isMultiple,t.tstatus from TENDERITEM t where t.id=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select sum(t.tamount) from TENDERITEM t where t.loanappid=#{loanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.update:
update TENDERITEM
ISRECORDED = #{isrecorded,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TSTATUS = #{tstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where TNO = #{tno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TENDERITEM
LOANAPPID = #{loanappid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TNO = #{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TNAME = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMODE = #{timode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VALUEDATE = #{valuedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TAMOUNT = #{tamount,jdbcType=FLOAT},
FINISHTAMOUNT = #{finishtamount,jdbcType=FLOAT},
TPRO = #{tpro,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TBEGINTIME = #{tbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TENDTIME = #{tendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOANTIME = #{loantime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAYORMONTH = #{dayormonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TINTEREST = #{tinterest,jdbcType=FLOAT},
TDESC = #{tdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSTATUS = #{tstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PMISCPAYMAN = #{pmiscpayman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PMISCRECMAN = #{pmiscrecman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AVERAGEMONEY = #{averagemoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},

ISTEMPLET = #{istemplet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUDITMAN = #{auditman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISRECORDED = #{isrecorded,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BIDPRODTYPE = #{bidprodtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETDATE = #{retdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTRETDATE = #{lastretdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISCOMPENSATORY = #{iscompensatory,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPENSATORYMAN = #{compensatoryman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ONANDDOWN =#{onanddown,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVESTERRANGE =#{investerrange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from TENDERITEM t where t.tpro=#{tpro,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.tstatus in(1,2,9)

select
from TENDERITEM t where t.tpro=#{tpro,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.tstatus in(1,2,3,9)
select t.id,t.loanappid,t.tstatus,t.onanddown from tenderitem t where t.tstatus=2 and t.tbegintime < #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < t.tendtime
select t.id,t.loanappid,t.tstatus,t.onanddown from tenderitem t where t.tstatus=1 and t.tendtime < #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select t.id,t.loanappid,t.tstatus,t.onanddown from tenderitem t where t.tstatus=3 and t.tendtime < #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
